sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢这件衣服，不过太贵了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan zhè jiàn yīfu, búguò tài guì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime ce vêtement, mais c'est trop cher.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like this piece of clothing, but it's too expensive.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me lève à six heures tous les matins.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I get up at six o'clock every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bāo táng yǒu wǔbǎi kè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce paquet de sucre fait cinq cents grammes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bag of sugar weighs five hundred grams.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hǎojiǔ bù jiàn!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ça fait longtemps !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Long time no see!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǎnshang wǒmen qù kàn diànyǐng ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons voir un film ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go watch a movie tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎoshang hǎo!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonjour ! (le matin)
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Good morning!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī diào zài dìshàng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon téléphone est tombé par terre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My phone fell on the ground.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ gěi nǐ fā yī tiáo duǎnxìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je t'envoie un SMS.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'll send you a text message.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kuài diǎnr, wǒmen yào chídào le!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dépêche-toi, on va être en retard !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hurry up, we're going to be late!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kuàidì yǐjīng sòngdào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le colis a déjà été livré.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The delivery has already arrived.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhōumò qù dòngwùyuán ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons au zoo ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go to the zoo this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiě le yī piān wénzhāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai écrit un article.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I wrote an article.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì sān niánjí de xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est élève en troisième année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a third-grade student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tǐyùchǎng lǐ yǒu hěn duō rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de monde au stade.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many people in the stadium.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ qù yínháng qǔ qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais à la banque retirer de l'argent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm going to the bank to withdraw money.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiāngzi hěn qīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette valise est très légère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This suitcase is very light.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu shísì yì rénkǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a une population de 1,4 milliard d'habitants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has a population of 1.4 billion.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他讲了一个很好笑的笑话。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jiǎng le yī gè hěn hǎoxiào de xiàohua.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a raconté une blague très drôle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He told a very funny joke.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì zúqiú duì de chéngyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est membre de l'équipe de football.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a member of the football team.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 谢谢你带来了这么多礼物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xièxie nǐ dàilái le zhème duō lǐwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci d'avoir apporté autant de cadeaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for bringing so many gifts.
